Enable[1]  Instruction[16] N[1] Z[1] C[1] V[1]  Offset[11] Verified[1]

# --- Enable=0 (doit tout forcer à 0) ---
0 1101000000000000  0 0 0 0 00000000000 0
0 1101000111111111  1 1 1 1 00000000000 0
0 1101111000000001  0 1 0 1 00000000000 0
0 1101111101010101  1 0 1 0 00000000000 0

# --- EQ (0000) : Z==1 ---
1 1101000000000001  0 1 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101000001111111  1 1 1 1 00001111111 1
1 1101000010000000  0 0 0 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101000010101010  1 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- NE (0001) : Z==0 ---
1 1101000100000001  0 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101000101111111  1 0 1 1 00001111111 1
1 1101000110000000  0 1 0 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101000111111111  1 1 1 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- CS/HS (0010) : C==1 ---
1 1101001000000000  0 0 1 0 00000000000 1
1 1101001010101010  1 1 1 0 11110101010 1
1 1101001011111111  0 0 0 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101001000000001  1 1 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- CC/LO (0011) : C==0 ---
1 1101001100000001  0 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101001110000000  1 1 0 1 11110000000 1
1 1101001101111111  0 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101001110101010  1 0 1 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- MI (0100) : N==1 ---
1 1101010000000001  1 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101010010101010  1 1 1 1 11110101010 1
1 1101010001111111  0 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101010010000000  0 1 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- PL (0101) : N==0 ---
1 1101010100000001  0 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101010111111111  0 1 1 1 11111111111 1
1 1101010101111111  1 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101010110000000  1 1 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- VS (0110) : V==1 ---
1 1101011000000000  0 0 0 1 00000000000 1
1 1101011010000000  1 1 1 1 11110000000 1
1 1101011001111111  1 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101011010101010  0 1 0 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- VC (0111) : V==0 ---
1 1101011100000001  0 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101011110101010  1 1 1 0 11110101010 1
1 1101011101111111  1 0 1 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101011110000000  0 1 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- HI (1000) : C==1 et Z==0 ---
1 1101100000000001  0 0 1 0 00000000001 1
1 1101100010000000  1 0 1 1 11110000000 1
1 1101100001111111  0 1 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101100010101010  1 0 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- LS (1001) : C==0 ou Z==1 ---
1 1101100100000001  0 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101100111111111  1 1 1 1 11111111111 1
1 1101100101111111  0 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101100110000000  1 0 1 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- GE (1010) : N==V ---
1 1101101001111111  0 0 1 0 00001111111 1
1 1101101010000000  1 1 0 1 11110000000 1
1 1101101010101010  1 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101101000000001  0 1 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- LT (1011) : N!=V ---
1 1101101100000001  1 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101101110101010  0 1 1 1 11110101010 1
1 1101101101111111  0 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101101110000000  1 1 0 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- GT (1100) : Z==0 et N==V ---
1 1101110000000001  0 0 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101110010000000  1 0 1 1 11110000000 1
1 1101110001111111  0 1 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101110010101010  1 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- LE (1101) : Z==1 ou N!=V ---
1 1101110100000001  0 1 0 0 00000000001 1
1 1101110110101010  1 0 0 1 11110101010 0
1 1101110101111111  0 0 1 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101110110000000  1 0 1 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0

# --- AL (1110) : toujours vrai ---
1 1101111000000000  0 0 0 0 00000000000 1
1 1101111011111111  1 1 1 1 11111111111 1
1 1101111001111111  0 1 0 1 00001111111 1
1 1101111010000000  1 0 1 0 11110000000 1

# --- 1111 : “toujours faux” (souvent jamais utilisé, mais on peut tester le câblage) ---
1 1101111100000001  0 0 0 0 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
1 1101111111111111  1 1 1 1 xxxxxxxxxxx 0
